title: Director, Fundraising and Strategic Partnerships

description:
Position Summary

In this role, you will work in close partnership with startup CEOs to effectively raise an investment round, from kickoff to close. You will be responsible for overseeing the operations, strategy, and marketing of the raise, and will need to effectively manage internal and external stakeholders. This is a challenging role that requires a combination of strategic thinking, effective communication, and strong organizational skills.

  Key Responsibilities
• Fundraising: Lead the fundraising efforts for our portfolio companies, developing and executing comprehensive fundraising strategies.
• Strategic Partnerships: Identify and cultivate strategic partnerships that can support the growth of our portfolio companies.
• Stakeholder Management: Effectively manage internal and external stakeholders, including investors, board members, and team members.
• Operations and Strategy: Oversee the operations and strategy of the fundraising process, ensuring that all activities are coordinated and aligned with the overall goals.
• Marketing and Communications: Work closely with the marketing team to develop and execute marketing and communication plans that support the fundraising efforts.

  Qualifications
• 4-7 years of relevant experience in fundraising, investment banking, or a related field.
• Strong understanding of the startup ecosystem and the fundraising process.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Meticulous attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
• Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
• Proficiency in Google Docs, Slides, and Sheets or Microsoft Office.

  What Experience Would Be an Added Bonus?
• Experience at a fast-growing company or an entrepreneurial background (including as a founder!).
• Previous experience in fundraising, client services, or at a venture firm, accelerator, or agency.
• Experience writing for a business audience; storytelling and experience writing investor communications a plus.
• Advanced degrees, especially an MBA or a management-related degree.

  Why is This a Great Opportunity?
• Shape the narrative of cutting-edge products and empower entrepreneurs to raise capital and revolutionize industries.
• Make a significant difference in the startup ecosystem.
• Collaborate with visionary CEOs.
• Play a pivotal role in supporting innovative startups building groundbreaking products.
• Develop a strong personal brand in the startup and investment space.
